channel.title: [317] NPC Following
channel.description:
Hi,
I am looking to improve the NPC system in my RSPS (based off of TestScape). Where do I start with an NPC following system (the NPC follows when you attack)?
I've got no clue as to how this would be implemented.

item.title: [317] NPC Following
item.dc:creator: @jSherz jSherz
item.description:
@jSherz wrote:

Do you know how I would go about doing the actual movement part? As in where the NPC movement code is located? NPCHandler?

Read full topic
